fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player. One of various effects may happen to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The possible effects are:
* Being removed from the game and being readded the next day
* Becoming unvisitable for one night
* Dying
* Requiring two extra votes to be hanged the next day
* Roleblocked
* All abilities permanently delayed by one night
* Healed and purged
* Receives a random notification from any role capable of giving one
- This role should also have the alias of =jdinshamblesrn-2.
